dcterms:description: Ego4D contains 3,670 hours of egocentric videos of people performing diverse tasks (from cooking to farming) across the globe. It is used for action recognition tasks with annotations from the Hands+Objects temporal localization benchmark.
dcterms:title: Ego4D

dcterms:description: EPIC-Kitchens contains 100 hours of egocentric videos capturing daily activities in kitchen environments. It is used for action recognition tasks with annotations from the action recognition benchmark.
dcterms:title: EPIC-Kitchens-100
